events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue is categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of return and money back.
Assigning the refund request to agent Sarah M. for further assistance regarding the customer's return inquiry.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out about your jacket return. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please confirm the order number and let me know if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached, and hasn’t been worn.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 30 days using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions for the return shipment.
The return process has been set up successfully. You should receive an email with your shipping label within minutes.
Just checking in to confirm you received the shipping label and if you need any further help with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Thanks again for your assistance!
The refund has been processed and your case is now closed. Feel free to contact us if you need any more help.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey. Please let us know how you felt about the refund experience.
